Posts.Content: What a wonderful news , make sure you enjoy every single day of your freedom .  Live , love and laughter should be your philosophy .  Best wishes
Posts.Title: Cancer free

Posts.Content: Any of you had this problem ?? I have finished radiotherapy last Friday , my nipple has got more inverted and is sore flaky and very uncomfortable also is weepy with a watery discharge . Is Sunday tomorrow and iam  not Sure what to do . Any advice ?  Thank you
Posts.Title: My nipple is very sore

Posts.Content: Thank you Gail I will do .  I am still awake not feeling great  X
